alert.note: Alert for Bent; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 8:58PM MDT until June 16 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 858 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Higbee, or 9 miles southeast of North La Junta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Otero and southwestern Bent Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
